name: Merc Zone
description:
Enter the Merc Zone, the summer’s most stylish suit-and-tie shooter! Make a killing as you chain killstreaks and collect bounties from around the world in fast-paced first-person arena battles. 

Players drop in to hyper-modern combat zones, selecting from multiple available classes - including; Brock (assault), Cochese (stealth), Crazy Ed (gunner), Bingo (sniper), Ogre (heavy).

Our exclusive tech means super high frame rates even on Chromebooks and older laptops. New maps and classes added weekly, with tons of features on the roadmap.

Controls;
Move = WASD
Jump = Space
Shoot = Left Mouse Button
Aim Down Sight = Right Mouse Button
Reload = R
Switch Weapon = E / Mouse Scroll
Grenade = G
Crouch = C / Shift
Interact = F
